text: Quintin Hughes (born October 14, 1999) is an American ice hockey defenseman. He is currently playing for the Vancouver Canucks of the National Hockey League (NHL). The team drafted him 7th overall during the 2018 NHL Entry Draft. After playing with the USA Hockey National Team Development Program, Hughes joined the University of Michigan for the 2017–18 season. He played two seasons with Michigan before joining the Canucks for their 2018–19 NHL season. ==Career statistics== ===Regular season and playoffs=== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 2015–16 U.S. National Development Team USHL 34 4 7 11 10 — — — — — 2015–16 U.S. National U17 Team USDP 57 7 17 24 24 — — — — — 2016–17 U.S. National Development Team USHL 26 4 22 26 10 — — — — — 2016–17 U.S. National U18 Team USDP 65 10 43 53 30 — — — — — 2017–18 University of Michigan B1G 37 5 24 29 26 — — — — — 2018–19 University of Michigan B1G 31 5 28 33 16 — — — — — 2018–19 Vancouver Canucks NHL 5 0 3 3 2 — — — — — 2019–20 Vancouver Canucks NHL 68 8 45 53 22 17 2 14 16 2 NHL totals 73 8 48 56 24 17 2 14 16 2 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Vancouver Canucks players Category:American ice hockey defensemen Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Jewish American sportspeople Category:Sportspeople from Orlando, Florida
